mention.text: Opponents of any sort of gun control
a point I quoted three times and also paraphrased once in my brief article
`` a well-regulated militia , '' people trained , disciplined and armed for defense of the community under commanding officers
just the militia but `` a well-regulated militia , '' people trained , disciplined and armed for defense of the community under commanding officers
an unenumerated but undeniable right to own a gun
the right to own a gun
the Second Congress , which included most of the authors of the Second Amendment
the authors of the Second Amendment
the authors of the Second Amendment
the proliferation of guns in the hands of criminals
no barrier to sensible gun control
